body:
A special day.

In which the girl he loves is getting married today.

You looked at your lap, playing with the ring someone who gave you 5 months ago. You looked at the mirror, your wedding gown cleanly placed on the bed, ready to wear.

But something was stopping you.

Harry. You missed him, it was so long since the day you have broken up, you missed everything about him, but you didn’t let your feelings decide to stop the wedding. The huge weight off your chest was still there, because you want to show or tell him that you miss him, you want him to know what’s your feeling about this.

“Y/N?” Someone softly called, you looked at her, she was holding an envelope with a neat handwriting on your name. You hoped it was Harry, and just shakily took the letter.

“Thank you.” You whispered, and gave her a warm smile. She returned it and exit the room. You sat on you bed, slowly opening the paper, and taking a deep breathe.

Hello.

I would actually start this letter by a ‘Hi, Darling’ but I know that we’re not on that stage. First of all, I wanna say congratulations on your wedding, you deserve every happiness in this world.

I miss you. I wanna take that off my chest for 5 months now, I miss you so much, everything about you. My heart is still aching knowing you’re engaged to someone else, but I would always support you in every decision you make.

I’m sorry for hurting you this badly, and I know apologize won’t fix any of this, that’s why you need someone better. Someone better than me. I don’t want to make this letter longer, and waste your time, so I just wish you a happy wedding day, please be the person you want in this special day of yours. Thank you for everything, really.

I love you, Y/N. I always will.

Love,

H

A tear slipped on her cheeks as she gripped the letter tightly, inhaling the paper, your eyes widened as the familiar scent of him, he sprayed his own cologne on the paper. Her heart started to burst as she inhaled the scent, the scent that she used to smell every time they cuddle, hug and kiss.

She knew deep inside her that she still loves him, but she knew it was too late to cancel the wedding and be the one with his true love. She tried not to crumple the paper everytime she squeeze it, more tears coming out knowing that it would probably Harry’s last letter to her.

“It took me an hour to come in here, but I feel like you need support.” A familiar voice suddenly talked which made her quickly turn around. It was him, the person she’s been looking for. She walked over to him and just hugged him, his scent was flooding your nose, which made you eyes water again.

His arms tightly wrapped against you as he nuzzled his head on your neck, giving small pecks on your skin, afraid to let you go.

“Why did you left me?” You croaked out.

“People are just not meant to be.”

blog.name: pendantstyles
blog.title: you bring me home
blog.description:
hannah | vision isn’t 20/20, but harry is!!

+ requests are always open! +

masterlist

summary: hey :) my request about asexual y/n was that they are in a committed relationship for long an when make out and he kinda crosses...
question: hey :) my request about asexual y/n was that they are in a committed relationship for long an when make out and he kinda crosses a limit of hers and starts feeling a bit uncomfortable but he is a perfect gentleman while she is kinda freaking out about it bc it hadn't happen in a while? xx thank you!!
answer:
“hey, hey. s’okay.”

harry would calm you down as you’re sitting in a chair with your knee bouncing up and down, brows furrowed and lips being unconsciously bitten as you stutter out words you aren’t even sure yourself that you understand.

“oh god, i’m sorry. it’s just that-…”

“you don’t have anything to say sorry for, love. if anyone does, s’me. crossed a bit of a line that i didn’t even ask you if you were okay with it.”

he’d be holding you, your figure sat down and his figure stood up as he just rakes his fingers through your hair, hushing you as he apologizes and goes on with what he’s saying.

you haven’t explained it until awhile ago in the verge of making out and there’s discomfort creeping up your spine that makes you tense, and it immediately makes harry to stop and it went to here of just him standing beside you, assuring nothing but the truth.

“whatever you choose to do, or not thereof, s’your choice to make; not mine. completely okay with it, yeah? now stop saying sorry or else m’gonna continue my apologies too with no end.”

blog.name: pendantstyles
blog.title: you bring me home
blog.description:
hannah | vision isn’t 20/20, but harry is!!

+ requests are always open! +

masterlist

summary: hi i am terrified of storms. they dare THE HELL out of me especially at night. i HATE being woken up from huge claps of thunder...
question: hi i am terrified of storms. they dare THE HELL out of me especially at night. i HATE being woken up from huge claps of thunder (that is if i can even get myself to go to sleep in the first place). where i live the power almost always goes out and i get so nervous. write a blurb where harry is there to help you get to sleep before and after the storm? i know only you can write something to calm me. love you so much
answer:
hi i am terrified of storms. they dare THE HELL out of me especially at night. i HATE being woken up from huge claps of thunder (that is if i can even get myself to go to sleep in the first place). where i live the power almost always goes out and i get so nervous. write a blurb where harry is there to help you get to sleep before and after the storm? i know only you can write something to calm me. love you so much

okay but before this, for you to say that you know only i can write something to calm you is just so loving and so fluffy and god i love you so much


harry would first hear about the thunderstorm through the news, and it’s the day before it actuay hits but he goes to your house as if it’s that day too.

you’d be shocked at it first since he normally calls or texts you first before actually coming over, and you aren’t complaining in the slightest bit yet still ask and he’s a bit hesitant to say why since he didn’t want to scare you, but still did.

“don’t worry, prepared stuff for you. gonna be here until it ends.”

he’d say when the night settles and there could be flashes of lightning seen from the distance before you hear the actual clap of thunder, and he has a comforting hand on your waist as your eyes worry.

“bought you this; noise-cancelling headphones — not gonna hear a single sound and not gonna even hear you saying that you’re gonna pay me back.”

he says with a stern look as he took off the box of it from this bag he dedicated to putting things he thinks you’d be needing in, urging you to take the plastic off and try them on for a sec.

“may not hear the thunder, but i figured you’d still be worrying because you know there’s still a thunderstorm — so, bought one for myself too and that way, when we talk to get you to sleep, we could just call each other then you’d still be hearing me through them.”

harry smiles at his solution and you found yourself being interested in it too, a smile on your face as some worry’s depleting.

“bought you this gravity blanket too. biggest one there is so there would be no stealing covers. has extra weight to it that reduces anxiety, and feels like a hug too. no comparing it to my hugs though, mine are the best.”

he jokes and he hums, setting it down on your bed as he makes you stand up for a short while.

“powerbanks, this mini-fan, a hand fan. favorite chips too, some flashlights and this hotline to call the people who’s in charge of the electricity and stuff — got all that you need.”

harry assures as he’s setting things up and the both of you finally lay onto the bed, the rain and the thunder getting a bit more harsh now but he stops you from looking back on the windows he’s now covered with thicker curtains, and a comforting smile on his face.

“and me; you got me. s’gonna be morning before you know it, and it’ll be all over soon.”

“bought you this; noise-cancelling headphones — not gonna hear a single sound and not gonna even hear you saying that you’re gonna pay me back.”

he says with a stern look as he took off the box of it from this bag he dedicated to putting things he thinks you’d be needing in, urging you to take the plastic off and try them on for a sec.

“may not hear the thunder, but i figured you’d still be worrying because you know there’s still a thunderstorm — so, bought one for myself too and that way, when we talk to get you to sleep, we could just call each other then you’d still be hearing me through them.”

harry smiles at his solution and you found yourself being interested in it too, a smile on your face as some worry’s depleting.

“bought you this gravity blanket too. biggest one there is so there would be no stealing covers. has extra weight to it that reduces anxiety, and feels like a hug too. no comparing it to my hugs though, mine are the best.”

he jokes and he hums, setting it down on your bed as he makes you stand up for a short while.

“powerbanks, this mini-fan, a hand fan. favorite chips too, some flashlights and this hotline to call the people who’s in charge of the electricity and stuff — got all that you need.”

harry assures as he’s setting things up and the both of you finally lay onto the bed, the rain and the thunder getting a bit more harsh now but he stops you from looking back on the windows he’s now covered with thicker curtains, and a comforting smile on his face.

“and me; you got me. s’gonna be morning before you know it, and it’ll be all over soon.”

trail.content_raw:
hi i am terrified of storms. they dare THE HELL out of me especially at night. i HATE being woken up from huge claps of thunder (that is if i can even get myself to go to sleep in the first place). where i live the power almost always goes out and i get so nervous. write a blurb where harry is there to help you get to sleep before and after the storm? i know only you can write something to calm me. love you so much

okay but before this, for you to say that you know only i can write something to calm you is just so loving and so fluffy and god i love you so much


harry would first hear about the thunderstorm through the news, and it’s the day before it actuay hits but he goes to your house as if it’s that day too.

you’d be shocked at it first since he normally calls or texts you first before actually coming over, and you aren’t complaining in the slightest bit yet still ask and he’s a bit hesitant to say why since he didn’t want to scare you, but still did.

“don’t worry, prepared stuff for you. gonna be here until it ends.”

he’d say when the night settles and there could be flashes of lightning seen from the distance before you hear the actual clap of thunder, and he has a comforting hand on your waist as your eyes worry.

“powerbanks, this mini-fan, a hand fan. favorite chips too, some flashlights and this hotline to call the people who’s in charge of the electricity and stuff — got all that you need.”

“and me; you got me. s’gonna be morning before you know it, and it’ll be all over soon.”

title: Rome-Antics
body:
Love is a many splintered thing.

I’m all the way up I swear you’ll never bring me down

“Rooomee!!"The familiar Irish accent carried up the stairs causing hot tea from the mug curled between her knuckles to spill down the front of Romee’s new creme colored jumper."Blimey!” she huffed…

Read more…
